item.trans: n. 字母A；第一流的；学业成绩达最高标准的评价符号 row A in a cinema电影院第一排座位

adj. 土著的；原始的 n. 土著居民；土生生物 同义词:native, original, primitive, indigenous, indigenous population The " new " Australians began to build and settle on the aboriginal tribal lands .这些“新”澳大利亚人开始在土著居民部落领地上建房定居。
vi. 富于；充满 同义词:teem with, be imbued with Good fish abound in the North Sea.北海有大量优质鱼。
adj. 生硬的；突然的；唐突的；陡峭的 同义词:sudden, short, angular to abrupt one’s visit突然中断访问
vi. 自制；放弃；避免 同义词:contain, restrain oneself to abstain from alcohol (或smoking)戒酒(或烟)
n. 摘要；抽象；抽象的概念 adj. 抽象的；深奥的 vt. 摘要；提取；使……抽象化 vi. 做摘要；写梗概 同义词:brief, summary, resume, deep, nonobjective, extract, brief to abstract juice from an orange从橘子中提取液汁
n. 滥用；虐待；辱骂；弊端；恶习，陋习 vt. 滥用；虐待；辱骂 同义词:punishment, vice, strain, maltreat to abuse a privilege滥用特权

n. 住处，膳宿；调节；和解；预订铺位 同义词:residence, adjustment, conditioning There is a familiar pattern in which youngsters turn to the movement for accommodation and then agree to follow a regime of fasting and prayer .一般最常见的模式是：年轻人为了找到栖身之所而投靠葛兰运动组织，接着便同意遵守禁食和祈祷的生活制度。
adv. 因此，于是；相应地；照著 同义词:therefore, hence, consequently, thus, then Please amend your copy of the contract accordingly .请将你的合同副本做相应地修正。

n. 会计，会计学；帐单 v. 解释（account的ing形式）；叙述 同义词:treasurer, rechnung, relating, explaining Cost accounting systems provide timely unit product costs through the use of perpetual inventory procedures.成本会计系统通过使用永续盘存制定期提供产品的单位成本。
n. 酸； < 俚>迷幻药 adj. 酸的；讽刺的；刻薄的 同义词:acerbity, sour, vinegary Little internalization of various acid transport sites occurs .各种氨基酸输送位点很少发生内在化。
vt. 承认；答谢；报偿；告知已收到 同义词:accept, agree, recognize, grant, face to acknowledge that the earth is round承认地球是圆的
vt. 获得；取得；学到；捕获 同义词:earn, buy, score, find, make to acquire an education受教育
adj. 丙烯酸的 Perspex lenses have long since been replaced by acrylic ones .有机玻璃晶状体很久以来已被丙烯酸的代替。
vt. 使适应；改编 vi. 适应 同义词:condition, suit, season, adjust, accomodate to, accommodate to I suggested he should adapt himself to his new conditions.我认为他应该使自己适应新的情况。
n. 有瘾的人；入迷的人 vt. 使沉溺；使上瘾 She is addicted to music.她酷爱音乐。

adj. 熟练的；擅长…的 n. 内行；能手 同义词:experienced, skilled, accomplished, clever, practiced, expert, sharp How many college students in Taiwan are more adept at Internet use and software than they are at human relationships ?有多少台湾大学生们正在变得越来越熟识互联网和软件的使用而疏于人际关系呢？
vt. 采取；接受；收养；正式通过 vi. 采取；过继 同义词:assume, take in sth The committee ultimately adopted his suggestions.委员会最终采纳了他的建议。
adj. 航空的 同义词:aviatic, aerial EADS is the European Aeronautic Defense and Space Company , the parent of Airbus .即欧洲航空防务航天公司，空中客车的母公司。
n. [物化] 气溶胶；气雾剂；喷雾器；浮质 adj. 喷雾的；喷雾器的 同义词:atomizer, nebulizer, sprayed This year , the scientists are measuring the heaviest aerosol pollution on Earth .今年，科学家们将研究地球上最严重的空气悬浮微粒污染问题。
vt. 影响；感染；感动；假装 vi. 倾向；喜欢 n. 情感；引起感情的因素 同义词:influence, impact of, impact on, catch, contract, tend, prefer, emotion, will, sensibility Bright light affects the eyes.明亮的光线影响视力。
n. 联号；隶属的机构等 vt. 使附属；接纳；使紧密联系 vi. 参加，加入；发生联系 同义词:associated company, receive, take on sb, participate in, take part in, go through to affiliate oneself to (或 with) a party加入某政党
n. 代理，中介；代理处，经销处 同义词:procuration, intermediary agent Which agency would then wish to appear before Congress ?会有哪家机构希望到美国国会作证呢？
vt. 摇动；骚动；使…激动 vi. 煽动 同义词:rock, shake, blow the coals, stir up The washing machine agitates the clothes.洗衣机搅动衣服。
n. 点金术；魔力 同义词:charm, fascination This fruitless quest was called alchemy by the Arabs .这种无谓的的探索被阿拉伯人称作炼金术。
n. 碱；可溶性无机盐 adj. 碱性的 同义词:alcali In other words the whole spectrum of levels is just like that of an alkali turned upside down .换句话说，整个能级谱恰好就像是上下颠倒的碱金属能级谱一样。
n. 过敏症；反感；厌恶 同义词:hate, hypersensitivity Avoiding whatever causes an allergy may not always be easy .避免任何一种过敏原因都不太容易。
vt. 分配；拨出；使坐落于 vi. 分配；指定 同义词:portion, part, appropriate, parcel out, to assign The Government has allocated funds for housing.政府已为住房建筑拨给资金。
vt. 分配；拨给；分派 同义词:portion, part We were allotted a house to live in.我们分得了一间住房。
n. 杏仁，杏树；杏仁状的东西 同义词:apricot kernel, apricot tree Almond is believed to improve memory .杏仁被认为是可以提高记忆的食品。
adj. 阿尔卑斯山的，高山的 同义词:subalpine Its main attractions are alpine lakes and waterfalls .它以高山湖泊和瀑布群为主要特色。
vi. 交替；轮流 vt. 使交替；使轮流 adj. 交替的；轮流的 n. 替换物 同义词:turn by one's, take one's turn, rotate, rotary, vicissitudinary, refill to alternate hot and cold compresses交替使用冷热敷布

adj. 供选择的；选择性的；交替的 n. 二中择一；供替代的选择 同义词:selective, vicissitudinary An alternative to the all red bouquet is to buy some white roses and insert one red one in the center of the bunch.一种花束与所有都是红色花朵的花束不一样是，去购买一些白色的玫瑰穿插在红色的玫瑰花束中。
adj. 铝的 n. 铝 But there is a penalty: aluminium components made with HPDC cannot usually be heat -treated.但是也存在缺陷：通过HPDC制造的铝部件通常不能进行热处理。

n. 爱好者；业余爱好者；外行 adj. 业余的；外行的 同义词:lover, fan, strange, leisure, lay Martinez of the University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio, using amateur tango dancers as subjects .合作，邀请业馀探戈舞者为研究对象，进行了第一个舞蹈动作的脑造影研究。
adj. 模糊不清的；引起歧义的 同义词:blurred He is so careful as not to say anything ambiguous .他总是小心谨慎，从不说任何引起歧义的话。

n. 舒适；礼仪；愉快；便利设施 同义词:ceremony, comfort, sunshine, protocol, ease Landscape improvements were also carried out at over 30 roadside amenity plots to beautify the environment .超过30个路旁美化市容地带也进行了园景改善工程，以美化环境。
n. [无化] 氨，阿摩尼亚 同义词:Amonia By 1930 ammonia production was a thriving segment of the American chemical industry .1930年合成氨生产是美国化学工业中发展较快的部门。
adj. 无定形的；无组织的；[物] 非晶形的 同义词:formless, unorganized The shape of this movement is still amorphous and incomplete .这些运动的形式上不确定和完善。
n. 分析；分解；验定 同义词:decomposition, dissolution Risk discount rate method is often used in risk decision analysis .风险贴现率法是风险决策分析中常用的方法。
n. 解剖；解剖学；剖析；骨骼 同义词:cadre, dissection Is it harassment if a man stares at a woman 's anatomy , or tells an off- color joke ?如果一个男人瞪着眼睛看一个女人的生理部位，或说“黄色”笑话，这是不是性骚扰？
n. 轶事；奇闻；秘史 同义词:ana He was about to favour us with a little anecdote connected with it , when you entered .你们走进来的时间，他正打算讲段和这有关的逸话给我们听听呢。
vt. 骚扰；惹恼；打搅 vi. 惹恼；令人讨厌；打搅 n. 烦恼（等于annoyance） 同义词:harry, ply with, brown off, worry, trouble It annoyed me to be kept waiting so long.让我等了这么久，真使我生气。
adj. 年度的；每年的 n. 年刊，年鉴；一年生植物 同义词:yearly, etesian, year book, almanac When annual income is forced to exceed annual expenditure , the result may well be misery .当每年的收入被迫超过每年支出时，其结果很可能就是痛苦。
n. 人类学 同义词:humanics It 's of the great academic value of anthropology and ethnology while it is also of strong readability .本丛书既有深刻的人类学、族学的学术价值，同时又有极强的可读性。
adj. 逆时针的；反时针方向的 adv. 逆时针地 同义词:counterclockwise, widdershins Anticlockwise turn the handwheel to close the door .逆时针转动手轮关闭箱门。
adj. 焦虑的；担忧的；渴望的；急切的 同义词:eager, hungry, desired, sick, keen But it is also because the bank is more anxious about inflation .但也有原因是，欧洲中央银行相对更忧虑通胀问题。
n. [脊椎] 猿；傻瓜；模仿者 vt. 模仿；抢台词 adj. 狂热的 同义词:stupid, fool, simulate, pattern, imitate, crazy, wild, enthusiastic, fanatical to ape another's style of writing模仿别人的文体
n. [昆] 蚜虫 同义词:budworm, greenfly The reproduction rate of the aphid is influenced by nutrition .蚜虫的繁殖率受到营养的影响。
n. 服装；衣服 vt. 给…穿衣 同义词:clothes, garment, array, wear, thread, dress, clothe He is gorgeously appareled.他穿着华丽。
vi. 呼吁，恳求；上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判 n. 呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；上诉；诉诸裁判 vt. 将…上诉，对…上诉 同义词:attract, clamour for, asking, request, motion, charm to appeal a case to a higher tribunal把案件向高一级法院上诉
vi. 出现；显得；似乎；出庭 同义词:occur, figure, offer, come out A woman suddenly appeared in the doorway.一个女人蓦地出现在门口。
n. 食欲；嗜好 同义词:weakness, habit, hobby Of all the colors in the spectrum , blue is an appetite suppressant .在光谱的所有颜色中，蓝色是一种抑制食欲的颜色。
n. 申请人，申请者；请求者 同义词:postulant, proposer What kind of person makes the ideal applicant ?什么样的人才是理想的申请者？
adj. 适当的 vt. 占用；拨出 同义词:suitable, proper, adequate, becoming, engage, take up to That selfish student always appropriates the biggest bookcase and desk.那个自私的学生总是占用最大的书橱和书桌。
vt. 近似；使…接近；粗略估计 vi. 接近于；近似于 adj. [数] 近似的；大概的 同义词:close to, border on, near, broad, round The computation of approximate solutions was an extremely laborious task .近似解的计算是极其繁重的工作。
adj. 适于耕种的；可开垦的 n. 耕地 同义词:tillable, cultivated land, tilth It is on the arable " construction " land that the latest policy offers something new .在用作建筑的非耕地方面，最新的政策倒是有些新的内容。
adj. 树木的；栖息在树上的 Monkeys live in an arboreal habitat .猴子生活在树上的栖息地。
adj. 努力的；费力的；险峻的 同义词:hard, rapid, bold, struggling Humans can quickly wreck the natural environment , but repairing it is a long , arduous process.人类可快速破坏自然环境，但修复环境却是漫长而艰钜的任务。
vt. 确定；查明；探知 同义词:confirm, identify, assure oneself to ascertain the facts查明事实真相
n. 方面；方向；形势；外貌 同义词:direction, orientation, situation, side, respect aspect of his enduring strength can be described , simply , as honesty .他那持久的力量中有一方面可以简单描述为诚恳。
n. 渴望；抱负；呼气；吸引术 同义词:longing for, eagerness Young Edison had a aspiration to be an inventor .年幼的爱迪生就渴望成为一名发明家。
vt. 集合，聚集；装配；收集 vi. 集合，聚集 同义词:aggregate, fall in, concentrate, collect, aggregate, mass, crowd The students assembled (或were assembled) in the school hall.学生们在学校礼堂集合。
vt. 维护，坚持；断言；主张；声称 同义词:maintain, say, submit, stay, advocate She asserted that she was innocent.她坚称自己清白无辜。
vt. 评定；估价；对…征税 同义词:evaluate, rate, value, prize The lawyers assessed the property at $35,000。律师们估计这笔财产价值35 000美元。
n. 分配；任务；作业；功课 同义词:allocation, distribution, role, mission, task Talking about your next job assignment is a good example of this .谈论你的下一个工作安排就是一个很好的例子。
n. 帮助；助攻 vi. 参加；出席 vt. 帮助；促进 Please assist her in moving the furniture.请帮助她搬家具。

n. 协会，联盟，社团；联合；联想 同义词:union, alliance, society, corporation, unity, combination This week , when the National Governors Association gathered inside the beltway for its winter meeting , innovation was the theme .这个星期全美州长协会为冬季例会而在国会环路内聚集一堂，改革是本次季会的主题。
vt. 承担；假定；采取；呈现 vi. 装腔作势；多管闲事 同义词:undertake, adopt, accept, shoulder, sustain, attitudinize, put on the dog The situation assumed a threatening character.形势显得很险恶。
n. 星号 vt. 注上星号；用星号标出 He added an asterisk to the first page .他在第一页上加了个星号。
adj. 气喘的；似患气喘的 n. 气喘患者 同义词:wheezy As I remember , my brother and sister both had severe asthmatic attacks in the childhood .我记得，我弟弟和妹妹小时候都得过严重的哮喘病。
n. 不对称 同义词:dissymmetry, unsymmetry Information asymmetry is the source of consumer loan credit risks .信息不对称是消费信贷信用风险产生的根源。

vt. 达到，实现；获得；到达 vi. 达到；获得；到达 n. 成就 同义词:accomplish, carry out, earn, acquire, come true, go, take, land, arrive at, achievement, effort, success, accomplishment, Vostro to attain one’s goods (或 ends, object)达到目的
vt. 吸引；引起 vi. 吸引；有吸引力 同义词:engage, absorb, produce, cause, operate, appeal, turn one on A magnet attracts iron and steel.磁石吸钢铁。
adj. 视听的；视听教学的 The WIPO report finds the three fastest growing technical fields are medical , audio-visual and information technology .WIPO报道发现三个增长最快的技术领域是医学、视听和信息技术。
adj. 听觉的；耳的；气味的；先兆的 同义词:acoustic, auricular You can use these tapes as aural material .你可以把这些磁带当作听力材料。
n. 权威；权力；当局 同义词:rod, jurisdiction That could add authority and legitimacy to council decisions .这可增加理事会决议的权威性和合法性。
adj. 有效的，可得的；可利用的；空闲的 同义词:valid, effective, virtual, telling, significant To maintain the integrity of the whole , these available choices are reciprocal ones .为要保持整体的完整性，这些可用的选择是相对的。
adj. 反对的；不愿意的 同义词:anti, unwilling When the dollar falls , as it has since March , risk - averse investors tend to buy gold .美元自三月份起一直下跌，下跌时，规避风险的投资商倾向于购买黄金。
n. 航空；飞行术；飞机制造业 同义词:avigation, airmanship And that is the same as the aviation industry 's contribution .这与航空工业在这一方面的“贡献”是相同的。
n. 英语字母的第二个字母；乙等（成绩） And you must ensure that you complete a Part A topic and a Part B topic .并且你必须确认你完成了第一部分的话题和第二部分的话题。
vt. 使…困惑；使…受挫折；用挡板控制 n. 挡板；困惑 vi. 做徒劳挣扎 同义词:puzzle, set back, confusion, checkboard It baffled me that he rejected my offer.他拒绝我的建议使我迷惑不解。
n. 障碍；错误 vt. 阻止；推诿；错过 vi. 犹豫；突然止步不前 同义词:error, mistake, obstacle, let, bar, stem, block, dispute, lose, prohibit, daiker, hang back He balked at making the suggestion.他畏缩不肯提建议。
n. 竹，竹子 vt. 为…装上篾条 adj. 竹制的；土著居民的 同义词:Abo The roof of a grass hut was bambooed.茅舍顶已用竹子搭好。
n. 烤肉；吃烤肉的野宴 vt. 烧烤；烤肉 同义词:bulgogi, bar-b-q They barbecued several pieces of beef, fowl and fish.他们在户外烤了几块肉、鸡和鱼。
n. 交易；契约；特价商品 vi. 讨价还价；成交 vt. 讨价还价；拿…做交易 同义词:trade, special, truck, compact, bar tack, make a deal, bar tack We refuse to bargain over the price.我们拒绝在价格上讨价还价。
n. 障碍物，屏障；界线 vt. 把…关入栅栏 同义词:limit, block, bottleneck The barrier to reform has always been political , not economic .改革的障碍总是政治上的，而非经济上的。
n. 珠子；滴；念珠 vi. 形成珠状，起泡 vt. 用珠装饰；使成串珠状 同义词:drop, gutta, foam formation The perspiration beaded his face.成串的汗珠挂在他的脸上。
prep. 超过；越过；那一边；在...较远的一边 adv. 在远处；在更远处 n. 远处 同义词:above, without, than, over, past, away, afar, yon Beyond those trees you'll find a summer house.在树林的那边你将找到一间避暑别墅。
adj. 双边的；有两边的 同义词:bipartite, two-sided Strengthened multilateral cooperation should and must respect and build on our already proven bilateral partnerships .加强多边合作应该也必须尊重和发展久经考验的双边合作关系。
n. （一个地区全部的）生物；生物学 同义词:life-form, living things The major could be a subject like biology , math or a foreign language .主修可以是一个学科，例如生物、数学或者一门外语。
n. 膀胱；囊状物，可充气的囊袋 同义词:urinary ladder, vesicae A windpipe , though , is a more complicated structure than skin or a bladder .然而气管是一个比皮肤或者膀胱复杂得多的器官。
n. 叶片；刀片，刀锋；剑 同义词:sword, vane A knife is sharp because energy has been focused at the blade .一把刀之所以锋利是因为能量被集中在了刀刃上。
vt. 使漂白，使变白 vi. 变白，漂白 n. 漂白剂 同义词:snow, go white, whiten, decolorant, whitener Mary's face was brown and the sun had bleached the ends of her hair.玛丽的脸色是棕色的，且太阳已晒白了她的发梢。
n. 吹；打击；殴打 vi. 风吹；喘气 vt. 风吹 同义词:stroke, shock, strike, hit, hiding, catch my breath The wind is blowing.风正在刮。
adj. 钝的，不锋利的；生硬的；直率的 vt. 使迟钝 同义词:dull, explicit, naked, dull, benumb to blunt the knife by using it to cut linoleum用刀砍亚麻油地毡而把刀口弄钝

vt. 夸口说，自吹自擂说；以有…而自豪 n. 自夸；值得夸耀的事物，引以为荣的事物 vi. 自吹自擂 同义词:braggadocio, self-praise, blow one's own born, blow one's own trumpet, blow one's own horn to boast about one's learning,abilities and success夸耀(或吹嘘)自己的学识、能力和成功

adj. 体积大的；庞大的；笨重的 同义词:enormous, huge Materials can already be made to do some of these things , but they are too bulky , rigid or complicated for practical use .虽然一些材料已经可以实现这些想法，但是这些材料要么体积庞大、面料僵硬，要么在实际运用中过于麻烦。
n. 平房；小屋 同义词:shed, cottage bungalow belongs to a rich man .这间平房是属于一个富有的人的。

vi. 探索，寻找；挖地洞，挖通道；住入地洞，躲藏起来；钻进某处；偎依著 vt. 挖掘，挖出；在…挖洞（或通道）；使躲入洞穴 n. （兔、狐等的）洞穴，地道；藏身处，住处 同义词:explore, search after, to dig, tap into, residence, hole, subway, underground, accommodation They burrowed into the ground.他们掘洞钻入地下。
n. 灌木；矮树丛 vt. 以灌木装饰；使…精疲力竭 vi. 丛生；浓密地生长 adj. 如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的 同义词:shrub, frutex, peter, cluster, robust, gross, rough, country That said , Bush administration could do more to help .那就是说，布什政府本可以提供更多的帮助。

symb. 碳（carbon） n. 字母C In line with this idea , molecular hydrogen was not found in complex C .与此观念相较，复合体C内并未发现氢分子的踪影。

vi. 作战；参加竞选；参加活动 n. 运动；活动；战役 同义词:war, battle, movement, activity, exercise, sport, battle We are campaigning for equal rights for women.我们正在开展妇女拥有平等权利的运动。
n. （大学）校园；大学，大学生活；校园内的草地 同义词:schoolyard, college life The students flourished flags campus .学生们在校园里挥舞旗子。
n. 食堂，小卖部；水壶 同义词:mess, refectory As for meals , tickets can be bought in the student canteen every day .至于伙食，学生饭堂每天都可以买到饭菜票。

n. [化学] 碳；碳棒；复写纸 adj. 碳的；碳处理的 同义词:kryptol A price on carbon , he argues , would threaten it.他认为，煤炭的价格会威胁到制造业。

adj. 随便的；非正式的；临时的；偶然的 n. 便装；临时工人；待命士兵 同义词:extraordinary, temporary, informal, odd, leisure suit, slack suit But his thoughts about the casual lethality of power and wealth in Russia are all the more convincing for being cautious .但他的关于权力的偶然致死率和俄罗斯的财富的思考则由于他的谨慎而显得更加让人信服。
n. 大灾难；大祸；惨败 同义词:fiasco, smashup Third , once the risks of financial catastrophe have passed , rapid easing can be mirrored by equally rapid tightening .第三，一旦金融危机的风险过去，快速的放松可以通过同样快速的收紧反映出来。
n. 种类，分类；[数] 范畴 同义词:variety, classification, kind, manner, sort, nature " Middle- class " describes an income category but also a set of attitudes .“中产阶级”描述的不仅是一种收入分类，亦是一套看法。

adj. [化学] 腐蚀性的；[化学] 苛性的；刻薄的；焦散的 n. [助剂] 腐蚀剂；苛性钠；焦散曲线 同义词:acid, vitriolic, corrosive agent, cauterant That invited criticism , and sometimes caustic caricature .而这些遭受批评和有时尖酸刻薄的漫画讽刺。

n. 典礼，仪式；礼节，礼仪；客套，虚礼 同义词:service, protocol, exercise The award ceremony will start soon .颁奖仪式很快就要开始了。

n. 氯化物 同义词:muriate The reactions are conveniently studied using a solution of titanium chloride .用氯化钛溶液可以很方便地研究钛的反应。
vt. 呛；使窒息；阻塞；抑制；扑灭 vi. 窒息；阻塞；说不出话来 n. 窒息；噎；[动力] 阻气门 同义词:control, stay, restrain, plug up, block up, asphyxia, apnea The smoke almost choked me.烟呛得我几乎透不过气来。
adj. 慢性的；长期的；习惯性的 同义词:long time, standing, extended Chronic poisoning may lead to death from inanition .慢性中毒也可能由虚弱导致死亡。
n. 环境，情况；事件；境遇 同义词:context, situation, setting, event, occurrence, thing, scene In any circumstance where light is being absorbed , there is a pressure.在任何情况下，凡在光被吸收的地方，就有光压。

n. 高潮；顶点；层进法；极点 同义词:height, summit, sky, peak, pole His election to the presidency climaxed his political career.他的当选为总统使他的政治生涯达到最高峰。
vi. 坚持，墨守；紧贴；附着 同义词:stay, stand on He clung to the rope with both hands.他双手紧紧攥住绳子。

n. 离合器；控制；手；紧急关头 vi. 攫；企图抓住 vt. 抓住；紧握 adj. 没有手提带或背带的；紧要关头的 同义词:control, hand, grasp, guiding, hold, grasp, noble, collar He clutched the rope we threw to him.他紧紧抓住我们抛给他的绳子。
n. 杂乱，混乱 vt. 使凌乱；胡乱地填满 同义词:chaos, disorder, confusion, involvement, mix Newspapers and magazines cluttered the bedroom.卧室里到处都是报纸和杂志。
n. 外套 vt. 覆盖…的表面 同义词:outerwear, town clothes The floor is coated with varnish.地板上涂了一层清漆。

adj. 易燃的；易激动的；燃烧性的 n. 可燃物；易燃物 同义词:emotional, flammable, tinderbox, burnable Yet something momentous has happened in a pivotal country in the most combustible part of the world .然而在一个世界上最热点地区的关键国家，至关重要的事情已经发生了。

n. 骚动；暴乱 同义词:combustion, turmoil commotion arose in the aisle behind them among police guards and late comers.他们后面的走廊里，在警卫和来迟的观众间掀起一阵骚动。
n. 同胞；同国人 adj. 同胞的；同国的 同义词:brethren, countryfolk His compatriot Volta showed that this was not so .他的本国同胞伏打指出，情况并非如此。
vt. 强迫，迫使；强使发生 同义词:pressure, force, enforce They were often compelled to work eleven or twelve hours a day.他们常常被迫每天工作十一二个小时。
n. 补偿；报酬；赔偿金 同义词:payment, consideration, insurance, reward, offset As a first step , compensation committees and risk - management committees should be merged .第一步，薪酬委员会和风险管理委员会应合并在一起。
vt. 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编 同义词:to edit, copy-edit It often takes five or six years of hard work to compile a good dictionary.编一部好的词典常常需要苦干五六年。

adj. 复杂的；合成的 n. 复合体；综合设施 同义词:sophisticated, involved, synthetic, detailed, intricate Predictions about a mechanism as complex as the climate cannot be made with any certainty .对某种机制的预测就像不能作出任何肯定的气候预测一样复杂。
vt. 使复杂化；使恶化；使卷入 同义词:aggravate, exacerbate You mustn’t complicate the problem by raising new issues.你千万不要提出新的争端使问题更加复杂化。
n. 作文，作曲；[材] 构成；合成物 同义词:synthetic, songwriting He crossed off the needless words in his composition .他从作文中把不必要的字都删掉了。

vt. 合成；混合；和解妥协；搀合 vi. 和解；妥协 n. [化学] 化合物；混合物；复合词 adj. 复合的；混合的 同义词:synthetise, mix together, make it up, make peace with someone, mixture, hybrid, mix, mixed, hybrid He compounded water, sand and soil and formed bricks.他将水、沙和土掺和一起做成砖。
vt. 包含；由…组成 同义词:involve, contain The committee comprises men of widely different views.该委员会包括了具有各种不同意见的人。
adj. 凹的，凹面的 n. 凹面 vt. 使成凹形 同义词:hollow, cuppy Some are flared — that is , thicker at the rim than in the center , like concave lens .有些呈喇叭形──即边缘较中心厚，类似凹透镜。
n. 让步；特许（权）；承认；退位 同义词:recognition, license It is some concession .这已是一些让步了。
vt. 谴责；判刑，定罪；声讨 同义词:denounce, deplore Most people condemn war.大多数人都谴责战争。
vt. 承认；坦白；忏悔；供认 vi. 承认；坦白；忏悔；供认 同义词:accept, recognize, agree, acknowledge, grant, accept, recognize Now, I must confess that I'm at my wit's end.现在我必须承认我已毫无办法。
n. 保存，保持；保护 同义词:preservation, protection, maintenance, lee, safeguard This highlights one of the biggest problems in forest conservation .这就突出了森林保护领域的一个最大的问题。
n. 安慰；慰问；起安慰作用的人或事物 同义词:comfort, relief, sympathy My only consolation is your letters and phone calls .你的来信和来电是我唯一的慰藉。
adj. 不变的；恒定的；经常的 n. [数] 常数；恒量 同义词:permanent, steady, invariable They face a constant battle to protect pockets of high profits and have few chances to grow .他们面临一场保护高额利润口袋持久的战斗，这些利润很少有机会增加。
vt. 组成，构成；建立；任命 同义词:install, establish, form, found, build Four quarts constitute a gallon.四夸脱构成一加仑。
n. [数] 约束；局促，态度不自然；强制 同义词:enforcement, restriction That suggests the need for an institutional constraint .这说明英国需要一个制度上的约束。
vt. 查阅；商量；向…请教 vi. 请教；商议；当顾问 同义词:look up, speak together, take advice, seek advice I have to consult the manager about the matter.关于这件事我得向经理请示一下。
vt. 消耗，消费；使…著迷；挥霍 vi. 耗尽，毁灭；耗尽生命 同义词:waste, to use up, peter, spend He had consumed the best years of his life in prison.他在狱中度过了他的大好年华。
vt. 污染，弄脏 n. 受到污染的 同义词:soil, mud, spot, dirty, poison The river was contaminated with waste from the factory.这条河流被从工厂流出的废物所污染。
n. 偶然性；[安全] 意外事故；可能性；[审计] 意外开支 同义词:possibility, probability, feasibility, potential, chance Now they are falling back on a Plan C , contingency .现在他们又回落到C计划，以防意外事情发生。
vt. 反驳；否定；与…矛盾；与…抵触 vi. 反驳；否认；发生矛盾 同义词:negative, deny, deny, talk back She does not like to contradict her husband in public.她不喜欢当众与丈夫顶嘴。

adj. 相反的；对立的 adv. 相反地 n. 相反；反面 同义词:opposite, adverse, counter, against, cross, counter, backward, conversely, inversely, inverse, verso If the Fed 's board has only four governors, the regional presidents will be in the majority — contrary to what the Fed's founders intended .如果美联储董事会只有四位成员，那么地方的联储主席将会占大多数——而这与联储缔造者的初衷相背离。

n. 安全；保证；证券；抵押品 adj. 安全的；保安的；保密的 同义词:safety, assurance, certification, commitment, guarantee, safe, restricted One is food security .一个是食物安全。
adj. 有魅力的；性感的；引人注意的 同义词:attractive, catching It is a seductive theory .这是个引人注目的理论。
n. 选择，挑选；选集；精选品 同义词:chose, choice, pick Compute selection information before backup and restore operations .进行备份和还原前，计算选择信息。
n. 学期；半年 同义词:session, term Each semester there are examinations on the subjects being studied .每一个学期对所学的科目还要进行考试。

adj. 高级的；年长的；地位较高的；年资较深的，资格较老的 n. 上司；较年长者；毕业班学生 同义词:older, advanced, high, superior officer, nibs Joseph, Sr.大约瑟夫
adj. 明智的；明显的；意识到的；通晓事理的 n. 可感觉到的东西；敏感的人 同义词:obvious, aware, distinct, wise, visible This is a sensible agenda .这是一项明智的议程。
adj. 敏感的；[仪] 灵敏的；感光的；易受伤害的 同义词:vulnerable, subtle, quick It is also sensitive to acidity .聚合物对酸度也是敏感的。
n. 解决，处理；[会计] 结算；沉降；殖民 同义词:transactions, disposal, resolution, treatment, handling A constitutional settlement — or a prelude to more trouble ?修宪是解决问题还是更多纷争的前奏？
n. 排水沟，下水道；裁缝师（sewer的复数形式） v. 为…铺设污水管道（sewer的第三人称单数形式） 同义词:drains, waterways to sewer a new house为新房子设置下水道
n. 不足，缺乏（shortage的复数形式） 同义词:deficiencies, scarcities In 2009 fear of food shortages caused trouble throughout Africa .2009年食物短缺的恐惧给全非洲带来了麻烦。

adj. 重大的；有效的；有意义的；值得注意的；意味深长的 n. 象征；有意义的事物 同义词:valid, important, available, effective, virtual, remarkable, symbol, indication Even so , the gains from the victory of 1902 were significant indeed .即使如此，从1902年胜利取得的收获的确是重要的。
adv. 意味深长地；值得注目地 同义词:meaningfully, expressively More significantly , China and Russia both voted in favor .更重要的是，中国和俄罗斯都投了赞成票。
n. 路标；指示牌 同义词:roadmap, street sign to signpost the main roads to the city在通往城市的主道上设置路标
adj. 相似的 n. 类似物 同义词:alike, like, analog Similar situations occur all the time.类似的情况一直在发生。
adv. 同样地；类似于 同义词:equally, same, as, likewise Similarly , a condensate moves along a magnetic matter waveguide as a beam of matter .同样地，凝聚态以物质波束的型态能顺著磁性物质波导移动。

adv. 同时地 同义词:contemporaneously, synchronously Individual users would log on and allow other people to download music from their computers while simultaneously downloading music for themselves .个人用户登录后，允许其他人从自己服务器下载音乐，同时，从别人那里下载自己要的音乐。
adv. 真诚地；由衷地，诚恳地 同义词:truly, frankly, honestly, genuinely At least , I sincerely hope so .至少我是真诚地这样希望的。
adj. 社会的，社交的；群居的 n. 联谊会；联欢会 同义词:gregarious, sodality, get-together Their most important goal , they say , is to create social value .他们说，他们最重要的目标，是为了创造社会价值。
n. 解决方案；溶液；溶解；解答 同义词:liquor, dissolution The Afghan police , corrupt and poorly equipped , are often part of the problem rather than the solution .阿富汗警察，腐败并且装备落后，通常是问题的一部分，而不是去解决问题。
n. 溶剂；解决方法（solvent的复数形式） Strains require special treatments for removal such as spotting with organic solvents .要清除这些着色物质，需要特殊处理，例如：滴加有机溶剂。
adj. 往南的；向南行进的 southbound lane is closed because of an accident .南向的车道因为一起事故而关闭了。
n. 火花；朝气；闪光 vt. 发动；鼓舞；求婚 vi. 闪烁；发火花；求婚 同义词:A FRAME, scintilla, stimulate, launch, lift, drive, spirit, offer, coruscate Their eyes sparked with green in the dark night.在黑暗的夜里，他们的眼睛会发出绿色的闪光。
n. 专家；专门医师 adj. 专家的；专业的 同义词:expert, mavin, professional What she actually needs is urgent , specialist legal advice .实际上她急需的是专家的法律意见。
n. 专门化；特殊化；特化作用 This may be possible in a village society with rudimentary specialization .这种情况在初具专业化的乡村社会中是可能的。
vi. 专门从事；详细说明；特化 vt. 使专门化；使适应特殊情况；详细说明 同义词:specialise in, elaborate on, technicalize, elaborate on to specialize the book for children专为儿童写的书

adj. 特殊的，特定的；明确的；详细的；[药] 具有特效的 n. 特性；细节；特效药 同义词:precise, strict, decided, detailed, particular, quality, tang, identity, detail, character On the other hand, culture is concrete and specific .另一方面，文化又是具体的和明确的。
vi. 旋转；纺纱；吐丝；晕眩 vt. 使旋转；纺纱；编造；结网 n. 旋转；疾驰 同义词:wheel, circle, turn, swing, revolution, rotation, rolling, turning to spin yarn on the spinning wheel用手纺车纺棉纱
n. 喷雾；喷雾器；水沫 vt. 喷射 vi. 喷 同义词:foam, atomizer, eject, sparge, spritz to spray water from its mouth从其嘴中喷射出水来
n. 跳板；出发点 vi. 利用跳板跃进 同义词:walks, gang-plank She won the women's national springboard championship in1963 .她在1963年全国女子跳板跳水比赛中得了冠军。

n. 邮票；印记；标志；跺脚 vt. 铭记；标出；盖章于…；贴邮票于…；用脚踩踏 vi. 跺脚；捣碎；毁掉 同义词:symbol, impression, print, seal, flag, brand, heart, break down, go to sticks and staves They beat him down to the ground and stamped him on his body.他们把他打倒在地，并用脚往他身上踩。
n. 声明；陈述，叙述；报表，清单 同义词:presentation, profession, relation, representation, bill So , it is probably the most important brand statement that we make.因此，建立总部或许是我们发出的最重要的品牌宣言。

adj. 直的；连续的；笔直的；正直的；整齐的 adv. 直接地；不断地；立即；坦率地 n. 直；直线 同义词:continuing, endless, ordered, regular, running, constantly, directly, forever, rapidly, continually, beeline, gerade Tell us the straight of it .告诉我们事情的真相吧。
n. 战略，策略 同义词:device, tactic But this is a high-risk strategy .但是，这是一个高风险的战略。
vt. 伸展，张开；vi. 伸展；adj. 可伸缩的；n. 伸展，延伸 She's stretched out in the sun.她伸开四肢躺在太阳下。
vi. 打，打击；罢工；敲，敲击；抓；打动；穿透 vt. 打，击；罢工；撞击，冲击；侵袭；打动；到达 n. 罢工；打击；殴打 同义词:grasp, beat upon, impact, beat upon, stroke, shock, hit, hiding He's struck by his father.他挨了父亲的打。
adj. 结构的；建筑的 同义词:tectonic, configurational On that last crucial point , note the structural impact of the recession .至于最后一个关键点，要注意衰退的结构性影响。
adj. 顽固的；顽强的；难处理的 同义词:resistant, problem The defenders put up a stubborn resistance .防守将士进行了顽强的抵抗。
n. 工作室；[广播][电视] 演播室；画室；电影制片厂 同义词:atelier, workroom Can you explain what a studio actually is ?你能解释一下摄影场到底是什么吗？
adj. 后来的，随后的 同义词:succeeding, pursuant To this end , the first panel is generally quite short , with subsequent panels gradually increasing in length .这样做的结果是，第一个采区一般很短，接下来的采区一般逐渐增加长度。
n. 物质；实质；资产；主旨 同义词:matter, asset, essence, truth, texture Mercury is a fluid substance .水银是流体物质[流质]。
n. 郊区；边缘 同义词:margin, banlieue It is the oldest suburb in Melbourne .这是墨尔本最古老的郊区。
adj. 足够的；充分的 同义词:competent, plenty, wealthy His theory of atom was not sufficient for treatment of large atoms or molecules .他的原子理论用于处理大的原子和分子是不能令人满意的。
vt. 添后缀 n. 后缀；下标 同义词:sufix, postfix The details about the data suffix the text.详细的数据附加在正文的后面。
adj. 上级的；优秀的，出众的；高傲的 n. 上级，长官；优胜者，高手；长者 同义词:ranking, lofty, higher-up, prefect But he is a man of great dignity , superior talents and high ideals .但他是一个很有尊严的人，具有超人的才华和崇高的理想。
n. 供应厂商，供应国；供应者 同义词:provider In the scheme , the data supplier can dynamically revoke the traitor 's decryption ability .在方案中，数据发行商可以动态地废除叛逆者的解密能力。
n. 轻型四轮游览马车 At the end of July, a farmer in Surui ( Surrey ) noted that two of his cows were sick .六月底，萨里一个农夫发现他的两头牛病了。
adj. 周围的，附近的 n. 环境，周围的事物 同义词:environmental, ambient, context, circumstance, setting, condition Explosions release huge clouds of gas that envelop the surrounding area .爆炸释放出大量的气体云足可以笼罩整个地区。
adj. 可疑的；怀疑的；多疑的 同义词:doubtful, questionable Her initial symptoms were suspicious -loss of appetite , general fatigue , and dark urine .她最初的症状很值得怀疑：食欲减退、周身乏力、尿色加深。
n. 瑞士（欧洲国家） Switzerland is the biggest prize .瑞士是最大的战利品。
adj. 综合的；合成的，人造的 n. 合成物 同义词:comprehensive, integrated, artificial, general, composition Highly flammable synthetic materials should be avoided .高度易燃的合成材料应被避免。
symb. 氚（tritium） n. 英语字母中的第二十个字母 You t talk to a robot .而你不能与一个机器人对话。
n. 技术；工艺；术语 同义词:science, mechanics, skill If they need technology , they buy it from abroad .如果他们需要技术，他们就从国外买。

adj. 温和的；适度的；有节制的 同义词:pacific, moderate, gentle, soft, mild Tropical wildfires are different from the ones that happen in temperate woodlands , for example in the western United States .热带地区的森林野火与发生在温带疏林——比如美国西部——的森林野火有所不同。
n. 温度 All other common gases are cooled by expansion temperature and below it.所有其它普通气体在室温和室温以下时都会因膨胀而冷却。
adj. 理论的；理论上的；假设的；推理的 同义词:academic, reasoning China was then merely " a theoretical power ", and seriously overrated in terms of international trade and investment .中国那时只是“一个理论上的强国”，在国际贸易和投资方面被严重高估。
n. 烟草，烟叶；烟草制品；抽烟 同义词:smoke, baccy The first 50 years of the " cigarette century " were a golden era for Big Tobacco .对于大型烟草商而言，“卷烟世纪”的前50年是一个黄金时代。
abbr. 总联机程序和信息控制系统（Total On-line Program and Information Control System） Newspapers offer information , and they also cover a variety of topics .报纸给我们提供信息，包含各种类型的主题。
n. 旅游业；游览 同义词:pleasure trip, sightseeing Tourism has brought migrants from the mainland , too .旅游业同时也从大陆带来了移民。

n. 旅行者，观光客 adj. 旅游的 vt. 在旅行参观 vi. 旅游；观光 adv. 坐旅游车厢；坐经济舱 同义词:traveler, farer, take a trip, look round sth Some of them, like the Stone Crushers in Montego Bay , operate in tourist areas .有些帮派（如蒙特哥湾的“碎石帮”）就在旅游地区进行暴力活动。
n. 惯例，传统；传说 同义词:convention, usage, heritage, tale, prescription Among tribal people all knowledge inherited by tradition .在部落中，通过传统继承的知识。
n. 转让；转移；传递；过户 vi. 转让；转学；换车 vt. 使转移；调任 同义词:negotiation, diversion, make over, dispose of, hand, negotiate They will transfer those books into the new library.他们将把那些书搬进新的图书馆。
vt. 改变，使…变形；转换 vi. 变换，改变；转化 同义词:influence, fashion, vary, innovate, veer from, to change A little paint will transform this old car.喷点漆就能让这辆旧车变个模样。
adj. 极大的，巨大的；惊人的 同义词:huge, enormous, massive, macro, vast The impact of evacuation and relocation on those with health or functional impairments can be tremendous .撤离和重新安置对这些健康状况欠佳或身体残疾的人影响极大。
n. 打字文件 We receive several typescripts a day .我们一天收到几份打出的文稿。
n. 英语字母中的第二十一个字母；铀（化学元素） Shoes fixed while U wait.补鞋立等可取。
n. 不确定，不可靠 同义词:indetermination, unsureness And uncertainty affects behaviour , which feeds the crisis .不确定性影响着孕育危机的行为。
adj. 无伪装的；公开的；不戴假面具的 同义词:open, unconcealed From the start of that campaign , I faced undisguised hostility because of my sex .从竞选一开始，我就要面对他们毫不掩饰的对女性的敌意。

adj. 失业的；未被利用的 同义词:redundant, jobless Some 45% of unemployed blacks have been out of work for 27 weeks or longer , compared with just 36% of unemployed whites .大概有45%的黑人失业者失业时间超过27周甚至更长，而只有36%的白人失业者也同样如此。
adj. 不熟悉的；不常见的；没有经验的 同义词:young, unconversant Providing unfamiliar foods often leads to wastage and malnutrition and lowers the morale of the population .提供不熟悉的食品往往会导致食品浪费，营养不良，并降低人们的士气。
adv. 不幸地 同义词:unhappily, unluckily Unfortunately , fixing the slipstream drive is proving to be difficult , as usual .不幸的是，像平常一样修理滑流装置被证明是困难的。

adj. 不可思议的；难以想像的 同义词:magic, mysterious, miraculous, fantastic However , the key point is that the last 18 months have already produced a stream of once unimaginable events .然而重点在于，过去18个月已经发生了一连串曾经以为是不可思议的事件。
n. 联盟，协会；工会；联合 同义词:alliance, league, unity, combination, combined with In Union , he learned to talk politics .在工会组织里，他学会了谈论政治。
adj. 一致的，统一的；团结的，和睦的 同义词:consistent, uniform, harmonious, matching, corresponding Several firms were united to form one company.把几家商行合并成一个公司。
adj. 不必要的；多余的，无用的 同义词:spare, useless, waste, needless, redundant It is also the cause for unnecessary arguments .这也是许多夫妻无谓争吵的原因。
adj. 不需要的；有害的；讨厌的；空闲的 同义词:harmful, available, evil, leisure, off I did so and sent my niece a gift card to replace the unwanted " present .我收回了我的礼物，送了张礼品卡以替代那个不受欢迎的礼物。
adj. 上坡的，向上的 adv. 向上地；往上坡 n. 上升；登高 同义词:upgrade, upward, up, upwardly, airward, rise, upgrade, raise, ascension The last mile is uphill .最后一英里全是上坡路。
n. 利用，使用 同义词:employment, usage, exploitation, use We must utilize all available resources.我们必须利用可以得到的一切资源。
n. 英语字母中的第二十二个字母 abbr. 钒（vanadium）；伏特（volt） In September he published a memoir in which he compared himself to Henry V .九月他出版了一本回忆录，其中他将自己比喻成亨利五世。

n. 可变性，变化性；[生物][数] 变异性 同义词:adaptability, modifiability Climate change seems likely to shorten the rainy seasons and intensify variability , making storage even more important .气候变化很可能会缩短雨季，加大降雨量的不平衡，这使储水变得更为重要。
n. 变化；[生物] 变异，变种 同义词:shift, change, differentiation, diversification, turn This normal variation in rhythm is known as sinus arrhythmia .节律的这种正常变化称为窦性心律失常。
adj. 各种各样的；多方面的 同义词:varieties of, miscellaneous QUOTE】 The judge quoted various cases in support of his opinion .那法官引证许多不同的案例来支持他的意见。
n. 多功能性；多才多艺；用途广泛 同义词:multifunctionality Their versatility makes them extremely useful for medical research .它们的多功能性非常适合用于医疗研究。
